person.persName: John P. Beal (Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer, blacksmith and Justice of the Peace)

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer, blacksmith and Justice of the Peace. Kentucky native. Married to to Ruth S. Beal. Married to Lucy C. Cropper Beal in Carrol County, Kentucky on January 25, 1853. Father of Zimena Beal, Pheletus Beal, Ella Beal, and Joseph Beal. Farmer in Carroll County in 1850. Blacksmith in Henry County in 1860. Employed one enslaved person in Henry County in 1860. Justice of the Peace in Carroll County in 1862. Justice of the Peace in Carroll County in 1863.
